name: Block Puzzle – Brain Game
description:
Specially designed for brain training and stress relieving purposes, Block Puzzle is a great board game with its creative design of different shapes.
Download now and start to play without being worried about losing any piece of the puzzles! This jigsaw puzzle is a simple but an addictive game to release stress, improve mental sharpness and exercise brain.
How to play?
Choose your mode: Classic, Plus, Bomb, Survival or Hexa
Place pieces of blocks correctly and keep on playing
Level up and hit the highest score!
If you like our app, please rate and comment to help us improve!
